description:
Are you the parent of a high schooler? What about a teen looking into your college options? Although searching for a school can be exciting, you're probably also concerned about the rising cost of tuition. Is there really a way to knock out at least half of a college degree quickly and without taking on any student loans? I did it, and tons of other people do it too! Learn some of the best tips for success in avoiding those loans.

In this course you will

  • Hear my story -- I had over 60 college credit hours within one year after high school and was completely debt free!
  • Learn how to get ahead of college while in high school
  • Decide what action steps you want to take to avoid debt once you've graduated from high school
  • And overall how to get through college faster and with more freedom than your peers, which puts you way ahead of the game later on!


Please note: my course is based on the American college system. If you are attending college elsewhere, please take a look at this course within the first 30 days so that you can determine its relevance to your situation.
title: Attending college fast and with freedom from loans
